COMMENTS: The statistic assigned to BUILDINGS_DAMAGED is expressed as "Houses damaged" in the main reference.
Geo locations: Hyoogo, Kyooto, Nara, Oosaka (Adm1).

This should be taken as the most reliable source as it is an official report from the Japanese government one week following the event; DISPLACED_POPULATION refers to evacuees in shelters; building damage refers to housing damage where BUILDINGS_DAMAGED is the sum of those partially destroyed (14) and partially damaged (8,072).
People in public shelters on week following the earthquake (https://www.japantimes.co.jp/news/2018/06/25/national/osaka-takes-stock-week-violent-rush-hour-quake/)
